```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(ragg)
library(colorspace)
```


```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
world_res <- read_html("http://weedscience.org/Summary/CountrySummary.aspx")
```


```{r}
resistance_chart <- world_res %>% 
    html_node("table") %>% 
    html_table(fill = TRUE, header = TRUE)
```


```{r}
resistance_chart %>% 
  janitor::row_to_names(row_number = 1) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = A:Other, names_to = "SOA", values_to = "Number")
```



```{r}
scholar <- read_html("https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=nwwARKUAAAAJ&view_op=list_works&sortby=pubdate")
```


```{r}
scholar_chart <- scholar %>% 
    html_nodes(".gsc_a_t , .gsc_a_c , .gsc_a_y , .gsc_a_a") %>%

scholar_chart
```
